channel.title: News in a Nutshell
channel.description: I've always wanted to stay updated with the news and share it in a way that's easy and engaging, but juggling that with a full-time job isn't easy. So, I built this Podcast - a simple way to break down the biggest stories. I source news from credible outlets, and AI helps edit and present it based on an algorithm I developed. It's my way of staying informed, and I hope it benefits you too.

item.title: Nigeria's Tax Reform, U.S.-China Tech Tensions & Clean Energy Growth
